tha-ap549:8.2: asaṅkheyyampi yojanaṃ → asaṅkheyyepi yojane (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap549:12.4: sutvāna vimalaṃ ahaṃ → sutvāna vimalānahaṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
tha-ap549:22.2: kañcanagghiyaṃ → rajjaṃ pādesikaṃ ca yaṃ (bj) | dibbānubhosahantadā (sya1ed, sya2ed) | rajjapādesikañ ca yaṃ (pts-vp-pli1ed)
